title: WORLD MAP PROBLEMS #2
body:
WOOOO, and we are back to this.
this is most likely just me asking questions that are answered in the short novels and bios, but.... eh

_**FRELJORD**_
-Why is sejuani homeless?
-why is Olaf homeless?
-where is ornns giant fucking cave house.
-Frostguard citadel is suppose to be Howling Abyss based on its texts, but where is the bridge? is the world of runeterra so big that a bridge is unseen to the human eye?

**_Ionia_**
-What happened to Rakan and Xayahs tribe? or just vastaya in general?
-why dosen't Ionia take the small island on its borders? even if its a divide and conquer sort of 'nation' it would still make sense to take islands that pose not a threat.
-shouldn't wuju have its own pin? wukong and Yi studied it. (read lore for info) 
- why dosen't the giant capital for Ionia have more champions? and why is swain part of it?

_**BILGEWATER**_
-not much i want to complain about, but i feel like we can get a link to burning tides in 'featured in bilgewater'


_**Shadow Isles**_
-where are pins for the vault thresh guarded? or the well of life? or where mao'kai once stood?


_**Bandle city**_
If i glue the portal shut, can teemo never get out?

replies.body:
Hello again I've come to bring you short stories (not really)

**FRELJORD**

> Why is sejuani homeless?

Not homeless, going to be expanded soon (Nunu update).

> Why is Olaf homeless?

Same as Sejuani

> Where is ornns giant fucking cave house?

Hearth-home is southeast of the Howling Abyss

> Frostguard citadel is suppose to be Howling Abyss based on its texts, but where is the bridge? is the world of runeterra so big that a bridge is unseen to the human eye?

Yes. Only Valoran is more or less the size of North America. Difficult to see a bridge.

**Ionia**
> What happened to Rakan and Xayahs tribe? or just vastaya in general?

Travelling like guerrilla fighters, not located right now. Vastayan tribes are dispersed through the land and we don't know any specific territory.

> Why dosen't Ionia take the small island on its borders? even if its a divide and conquer sort of 'nation' it would still make sense to take islands that pose not a threat.

Probably the resistance tried but i'm sure that is a difficult task. Maybe very difficult if the coming Syndra story (leaked) takes place there.

> Shouldn't wuju have its own pin? wukong and Yi studied it. (read lore for info)

Probably yes. And I think the Wuju at the map is a village.

> Why dosen't the giant capital for Ionia have more champions? and why is swain part of it?

Is not the capital, just an important sacred place where a big battle against Noxus happened. Irelia cut the Swain's arm in that battle.

> Probably the resistance tried but i'm sure that is a difficult task. Maybe very difficult if the coming Syndra story (leaked) takes place there.

I just want to point out that it did take place there, to be precise, its Fae'lor. I know it because I read it already before it got removed.
I supposed that. Just didn't remember the name of the fortress to be sure. I only had time to read it a couple of times.
